nonce.title: proof of work nonce
nonce.summary: A 32-byte value which, combined with the mix-hash, proves that a sufficient amount of computation has been carried out on this block

nonceOrNull.title: proof of work nonce or null if pending

hash.title: proof of work hash
hash.summary: The proof of work hash of the specified block; this can be found via the Nonce and MixHash

mixHash.title: mix hash
mixHash.summary: A 32-byte hash which, combined with the nonce, proves that a sufficient amount of computation has been carried out on this block

totalDifficulty.title: total difficulty
totalDifficulty.summary: total difficulty of the best chain until this block

seedHash.title: seed hash
seedHash.summary: The Keccak-256 hash of the previous epoch's seed hash, if it's the first block then it's the Keccak-256 hash of a series of 32bytes of zeros
